nodes.text: The Braggan's Fist Camp was the main camp of the Braggan's Fist, a group of criminals on Corellia at the time of the Galactic Civil War. The thugs had established their camp half a kilometer outside of the city of Tyrena.

Circa 1 ABY, retired CorSec officer Lt. Col. Wilfred Quelsh asked an independent agent to investigate the theft of his Corellian Medal of Honor. The agent interrogated several members of the group in the slums of Tyrena until they revealed the location of their main camp. At the camp, the agent found Kal Braggan's datapad that the thugs' leader had left behind when he went into hiding. The agent later discovered that Quelsh had murdered Braggan.
Around the same time, CorSec Sergeant Hus recruited a spacer to recover some stolen goods from the Braggan's Fist thugs in their camp.

The Braggan's Fist Camp was a location in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Braggan's Fist Camp was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006. It was part of the quest "CorSec Case Files: Stolen Honor" which was part of the Legacy quest line, the longest quest line in the game.
